songs.title: Like That Summer Feeling
songs.lyrics:
--- November 13, 2019 update---
No longer part of Fine Line original release. May be included on Deluxe version. TBD

[VERSE 1]
Oh hey baby won't you walk my way
A stranger until I looked into your beautiful face
And saw your body moving all over mine
And decided that we really shouldn't waste our time

[VERSE 2]
You told me you wanted to take it slow
But we've only got a summer then it's back on the road
Blue eyes shining, I can see the horizon
In that hotel room, you really let your feelings show

[Chorus]
Hit me baby with that white blinding heat
And make me yours until we get lost in the sheets
Leave a mark and tease me like you know I want
Ooooh baby you taste just like that summer feeling

[VERSE 3]
My world is on fire, I wanna feel it burn
You're a beacon of hope when my world starts to turn
Stolen kisses in the hallway and hiding from the crowds
It gets me all hot and bothered and I just want you to-

[BRIDGE]
Touch me
Feel me
Put your lips on mine

Use me
Soothe me
Apple of my eye

[VOCALIZATION] Oooooooooooooh

[Chorus] x2

[OUTTRO]
Like that summer feeling
You taste just like that summer feeling
Repeat x3 until fade out
